alert.note: Alert for Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Western Franklin (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 18 at 5:07AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON EDT TODAY THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of northern Connecticut, including the following area, Hartford. Portions of Massachusetts, including the following areas, Franklin, Hampden, Hampshire, Northern Middlesex and Northern Worcester. * WHEN...From Noon EDT today through this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Western Franklin
